segments.text: I glance in and spot the overflowing sink first.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water sheets down to the floor in a steady flow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is drying a plate, eyes on it only.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's unaware of the mess at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To her side, stacked dishes wait on the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool is sneaking cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His reach is long, stool tipping slightly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands ready to catch her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window frames a tidy garden view.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Bushes line the path, all serene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, it's mischief and hazard mixed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but smile at their adventure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Though the water is a problem.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This moment feels full of potential chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR
